TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Verify exchange of Overlay update. Update details of the Overlay Elements: AlternateIdentifier, BaseMetadata, Extension, Identifier, NameWrapper.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A updates details of an Overlay which was already exchanged with Nation B. Nation B receives the update and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a topic, which includes the Overlay and the objects includes in it. Nation B has subscribed to this topic. The Overlay was already exchanged after it was created by Nation A so that it is available on both systems.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Overlay is displayed correctly on both Nationsâ€™ C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates the Overlay data.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B recieves the updated data and displays it correctly.
